vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Jer.39.3
§ Sarsechim = "prince of the eunuchs"
a ruler or general of Nebuchadnezzar at the taking of Jerusalem
vocabInfos._es_Definition: funcionario; en tiempos del rey Nabucodonosor
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒西金
1) 尼布甲尼撒王攻陷耶路撒冷時, 其麾下的一名首領或將軍 ( #耶 39:3| )
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
撒西金
1) 尼布甲尼撒王攻陷耶路撒冷时, 其麾下的一名首领或将军 ( #耶 39:3| )
